amendment.description: To prohibit the use of appropriated funds to take an action that would violate Executive Order 13149 (relating to greening the government through Federal fleet and transportation efficiency).

vote.text: Amendment SA 4618 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4618 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S7494-7496; text: CR S7494) To prohibit the use of appropriated funds to take an action that would violate Executive Order 13149 (relating to greening the government through Federal fleet and transportation efficiency).
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4618 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Dayton.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4618 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
